articles.title: The Morning After: Apple closes education discount loophole
articles.description: Apple has finally closed a loophole in the US that allowed most buyers to claim education pricing, even if they weren't actually a student or a teacher. First noted on Reddit, the US Apple Store now requires buyers to verify their status via UNiDAYS to be abl…

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Apple TV Plus teases its WeWork series with Jared Leto
articles.description: Apple TV Plus’ upcoming WeWork miniseries stars Jared Leto as former WeWork CEO Adam Neumann, with Anne Hathaway as his wife, Rebekah Neumann. The series covers the dramatic rise and fall of coworking company WeWork.
articles.content:

articles.title: Here’s how to clean your $19 Apple cleaning cloth
articles.description: If you were able to get your hands on one of Apple’s hottest products, its $19 polishing cloth, you also may have been unlucky enough to get it dirty. But never fear, Apple’s got official instructions on how to clean it.

articles.title: Streaming music report sheds light on battle between Spotify, Amazon, Apple, and Google
articles.description: Spotify was the largest music streaming service with a market share of 31 percent, with Apple Music and Amazon Music in second and joint third with market shares of 15 and 13 percent respectively, according to Midia Research.
